items.sentence: I don\'t have enough information yet to make a good decision.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was interested in classical music.
Tom didn\'t read the contract as carefully as he should have.
Tom didn\'t want anyone to know that he had been dating Mary.
Tom doesn\'t get along well with the other kids in his class.
I don\'t know how he can live with himself after what he did.
I hope you\'re the one that\'s going to be doing the driving.
I wanted Tom stopped, but I didn\'t think anyone could do it.
I suspect that Tom is unaware of what\'s happening in Boston.
Tom wouldn\'t have been able to do that without Mary\'s help.
